name: Space invasion 2000
description:
Developed by Markus Bergström, Daniele Vitelli, Andreas Hansen as part of the "Scripting and Unity" course at Futuregames.

Take control over your ship and destroy the enemy invasion before they can destroy you.

The game is hard but not unbeatable, do you have what it takes to complete it?

Controls

W/A/S/D - Movement
M1 - Primary fire
M2 - Secondary fire
